title: Soft and chewy gluten-free chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['285g gluten free flour', '1/2 teaspoon xanthan gum', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '60g cream cheese, at room temperature', '160g melted butter', '200g brown sugar', '75g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 egg yolks', '325g dark chocolate chips']
